name: Skyless Shrine
desc: No believer has the faith strong enough to pass the test of the sacred flame and gain access to step inside.

name: Nephrite Stairways
desc: The stairways of Nephrite records the memory of the two whose fates are bounded.

name: Glimmering Stream
desc: The bottom of this river is filled with riches. Riches that a certain someone left behind has now become the dream that many want but can never get.

name: Swirling Seas
desc: Be aware, the swirl here will not only twist the reflections in water

name: Blood Moon Plains
desc: In this wilderness, under the bright scarlet moonlight, the war between vampires and hunters continues.

name: Silverwood
desc: Under the tree with silver leaves and golden fruits, a utopia emerges!
